about_the_game:
Sweet Time is a restaurant simulation game where players need to play as a debt-laden protagonist to run a restaurant and pay off debts, and over the course of a year, you can expand your restaurant, renovate the layout, and recruit employees, with a variety of side stories and endings, which are up to you.

Recruit employees, upgrade and allocate skill points reasonably

There are dozens of employees in the game that can be recruited freely, rare employees bring their own skills, and there are many special employees to unlock. Reasonable training of employees is your greatest help!

Free decoration layout, try different style types

Upgrade and expand your shop, a variety of decorations and furniture styles, there is always one for you.

Foodie Kick Restaurant

Once a month, the gourmand kicks the restaurant and makes a dish that satisfies him!

Food Festival Competition

A quarterly food festival competition, run the restaurant reasonably, and strive to win the gold medal!

Multiple recipes, collected by you

There are up to 76 recipes in the game, collect it!
